Programming Experience

Development

I enjoy learning new languages and working with different software to transform ideas into something tangible.

Right now, I'm proficient in:
C++
Java
C#
SQL

I've worked with technology ranging from ElasticSearch to Scheme to Latex (Lah-tek).

Tech and Electronics

I like to work and develop with my hands. I've worked on an automatic blind opener project using the arduino platform and have also taken part in building a robotic arm in high school.

Web Development

Full stack web development combines both creativity and technical application in designing both the front end and the back end. I've worked with MySQL, MongoDB, PHP, MeteorJS, C#, AngularJS, Bootstrap 3 and Semantic UI.

Right now, this website is hosted with Digital Ocean using Nginx as a proxy layer, and written with Jekyll.
